title: IM HACKED
body: I CNA TLOG IN HELP ME

replies.body: There's currently a problem that's causing lots of logins to fail (including mine). It says so in the alert, so I wouldn't worry about it.
We were having a few problems with our login servers in the past hour, but everything should be ironed out at this point! Hit me back up if you still can't seem to get logged in though!

I'm still having trouble logging in to my main account. It's not accepting my password, nor are the recovery emails working. I also can't log on to the website. 

After a game I got a pop-up about being logged in on another computer and the client closed itself. Haven't been able to log in since.

Hmmmmm if that's the case then there's a chance that someone else might have gained access to your account! HAX!

I strongly suggest you hit up our account specialists through the [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) to make sure your account is secure!
